pageProps.title: The Berlin Hub
pageProps.description: The Life Itself Berlin Hub in Kreuzberg is an experiment in intentional community living. A place to push for change and grow together through shared values. Our beautiful co-living hub in Berlin has space for new members! If you want to live in a supportive community committed to wellbeing and social change, we'd love to hear from you

body.raw:
## Description

The Life Itself Berlin Hub in Kreuzberg is an experiment in intentional community living. A place to push for change and grow together through shared values. Our beautiful co-living hub in Berlin has space for new members! If you want to live in a supportive community committed to wellbeing and social change, we'd love to hear from you

## Key Resources

- [[../hubs/berlin|The Hub Page]]
